Questions.Question: Do I need to create a River Island account?
Questions.Answer:
You can browse online without creating an account, but to make a purchase at our online store, you will need to register with us.

Once you've created an account, shopping with us will be even easier and you benefit from:-

  • Faster checkout
  • Storing up to 6 delivery addresses
  • Order tracking
  • Review past orders
  • Up to date fashion news in our Newsletter

We’ll only send you email newsletters if you ask us to. We’ll never pass your details onto anyone else and you can unsubscribe whenever you like.

Questions.Question: Why can't I sign into my account?
Questions.Answer:
If you’re having trouble signing in, please check you’re using the same email address and password you used to register with us. Our passwords are case sensitive, so check you haven't accidently left Caps Lock on.

If you forget your password, visit www.riverisland.com to manage your account and ask us to reset it for you. An e-mail containing a link to enable you to create a new password will be sent to the email address you signed up to us with, but please make sure that you check your junk email folder in case it makes its way there.

Questions.Question: How can I pay on your site?
Questions.Answer:
You can pay using any of the following:

  • Visa and MasterCard credit cards
  • Visa Debit, Visa Electron, Maestro, Solo and Mastercard debit cards
  • American Express charge card
  • PayPal (iPhone only)
  • Visa Purchasing Cards

When you create an account with us you will be given the option to save your card details. This is not mandatory however it will speed up the checkout process next time you shop wth us. If you wish, you can save up to 6 different payment cards within your account.

You can also pay with your PayPal account. When you check out, you will have be offered the choice to pay with your debit/credit card or to checkout using PayPal. If you use PayPal, you will need to tick the box to accept our Terms and Conditions and then you will be taken to PayPal to complete your order.

Unfortunately at this time, we are unable to accept River Island Gift Vouchers or Credit Notes as an online payment method.

Questions.Question: Do you accept PayPal?
Questions.Answer:
New Answer

You can use your PayPal account to place orders on our iPhone app. You should sign into your River Island account (or create one if you don't already have one) as usual and when you check out, you will be offered the choice to pay with your saved debit/credit card, a new credit/debit card, or to checkout using PayPal.

If you use PayPal, you will need to tick the box to accept our Terms and Conditions and then you will be taken to PayPal to complete your order. Once you have completed your order, you will be brought back to River Island.

We are unable to process refunds to your PayPal account at our stores. If you wish your refund to be processed to your PayPal account, you should send your unwanted items back to us using the postal service, courier or Collect+. You are welcome to exchange goods bought via PayPal in our stores as usual.

Questions.Question: Will I be charged VAT?
Questions.Answer: All River Island products include UK Value Added Tax (VAT), where applicable.

Questions.Question: Do I have to pay import duties or taxes for orders outside the UK?
Questions.Answer: All River Island orders are shipped from the UK, so you may be charged import duties or taxes when the parcel reaches the delivery country. These charges vary and must be paid by the recipient of the parcel. If you have any questions related to customs charges, please contact your local customs office.

Questions.Question: What currency can I pay with?
Questions.Answer:
The River Island iPhone allows payments to be made in British Pounds Sterling (GBP), Euros (EUR), Australian Dollars (AUD) and US Dollars (USD) at this time. The iPad app currently only allows payments in GBP.

You can choose to pay in any of these currencies, no matter which countries you are in and the cost of your order will be converted using the current River Island conversion rate.

As a guide you can check the current exchange rate with your currency on this Currency Converter website to see how much you'll be paying in your own currency. However, this is only an estimate as your card issuer may have used a different exchange rate or applied extra charges.

Questions.Question: When is payment taken from my card?
Questions.Answer: We ask your bank for authorisation of your debit/credit card when you place an order with us. However, your card will only be charged when we despatch your goods to you; you’ll receive an email from us to confirm which items are being sent and the exact amount charged to your card. So if for any reason we are unable to send any items you’ll only be charged for the items we do send.

Questions.Question: Will I receive confirmation that my order is successful and on its way to me?
Questions.Answer:
Once you have successfully submitted your order, you will receive an automated email confirming your order details. Your order will then be processed by our warehouse team and you'll receive a despatch confirmation email when your order is despatched for delivery.

Your despatch confirmation email will contain details of how to track your parcel and you can find more information about this in the Delivery & Tracking your Order section of our FAQs.

Questions.Question: Can I add items, change or cancel my order once I've confirmed it?
Questions.Answer:
Unfortunately, once your order is complete, you can no longer add items, change or cancel your order. However, you can easily return any unwanted items to us for a refund (please see our Returns page for more info).

If you want to add items, you should place another order within 24 hours of your original order, then contact us with both order numbers, and we'll be happy to refund you the additional delivery charge.

Questions.Question: Can I place my order over the phone?
Questions.Answer: Unfortunately we do not offer an ordering by phone service, all orders need to be placed from your own online account..

Questions.Question: International Delivery
Questions.Answer:
International Delivery times and charges vary dependant on your country. To view a full list of the countries we deliver to along with associated delivery times and costs, please see our Delivery Destinations page.

Additional taxes, fees or levies may apply according to local legislation. Recipients of deliveries made outside the UK may have to pay import duty or formal customs entry fees. Any customs or import duties are charged once the parcel reaches its destination country. These charges must be paid by the recipient of the parcel. We have no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country so you may want to contact your local customs office for further information.

If you aren't available when your parcel is delivered, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

Questions.Question: What payment types do you take?
Questions.Answer:
You can pay using any of the following credit, debit and charge cards:

  • Visa and MasterCard credit cards
  • Visa Debit, Visa Electron, Maestro, Solo and Mastercard debit cards
  • American Express charge card
  • Visa Purchasing Cards

When you create an account with us you will be given the option to save your card details. This is not mandatory however it will speed up the checkout process next time you shop wth us. If you wish, you can save up to 6 different payment cards within your account.

Unfortunately at this time, we are unable to accept River Island Gift Vouchers or Credit Notes as an online payment method.

We also no longer accept the River Island Card as a payment method.

Questions.Question: Do your prices include sales tax?
Questions.Answer: The prices shown on our website are inclusive of sales tax (where applicable).

Questions.Question: I live outside the UK will I have to pay import duties or taxes?
Questions.Answer:
Please note that all River Island orders are shipped from the UK.

Any import duties and taxes payable, will be charged once the parcel has reached the destination country. These charges vary and must be paid by the recipient of the parcel. If you have any questions related to customs charges, please contact your local customs office.

Questions.Question: Why can't I pay in my own currency?
Questions.Answer:
All River Island products are priced in British Pound Sterling (GBP).

The price charged to our overseas customers will be determined by the exchange rate applied by the customer's credit or debit card company, at the time the transaction takes place.

Questions.Question: Has my order been shipped yet?
Questions.Answer:
As soon as your order is dispatched from our warehouse, you will be sent an email to confirm that it's on its way.

Our team work around the clock so you could receive the email at any time. From there it should be delivered within the timescale we advertise.

If your order is track-able you can check it's progress by logging into your account.

Questions.Question: How can I track my order (outside of the UK)
Questions.Answer:
Once your order is despacthed from our warehouse, you'll be sent an email containing your tracking number and a link to our carrier’s website that will tell you the current status of your delivery. Alternatively you can track parcels through your account.

Please note that some deliveries outside of the UK will be sent via an international postal service where parcel tracking is unavailable. If your parcel has been sent via an international postal service, you will have been notified in your Despatch Confirmation email.

If you any questions related to tracking your order please Contact Us and we’ll be happy to help.

Questions.Question: How do I return unwanted items (from outside of the UK)
Questions.Answer:
We hope you'll love every River Island purchase you make, but if you ever need to return an item you can do so within 28 days of receipt.

For your convenience you can return items in the following ways:

  • Via your Postal Service
  • To any River Island Store within the following countries

United Kingdom (excluding Selfridges and our Jersey store)
Republic of Ireland
The Netherlands
Belgium

Unfortunately we cannot accept returns to any of our International Stores.

For reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

For full details please follow the instructions on the reverse of the Despatch Note included in your parcel, or see our International Returns page

For detailed information, please see our Terms and Conditions.

Questions.Question: I received a faulty item, I'm based outside of the UK, what can I do?
Questions.Answer:
We want all our customers to receive top quality goods so if you think there is a fault with an item you have received, you can return the item back to us to assess even after 28 days of receiving your order. If any product fails to give reasonable wear - due to either defective workmanship or materials, we will refund you the purchase price.

We will also refund you an amount to cover your return postage. The amount we refund will be based on the country you are sending the items from and how much the items weigh. These amounts vary from country to country and will be refunded to the card you originally used to pay for your order. This guarantee is in addition to and does not affect your statutory rights.

For details on how to return your faulty items, please see our International Returns page.

Questions.Question: Will my return postage be refunded?
Questions.Answer:
Please note that River Island does not cover the cost of international returns unless the items being returned are faulty. For faulty items returned from outside the UK, once we receive your returned parcel, we will refund you an amount based on the country you are sending the items from and how much the items weigh.

These amounts vary from country to country and will be refunded to the card you originally used to pay for your order.

For customers in Germany, please Contact Us with your order number and we will advise you how you can claim back your return postage.

Questions.Question: Do you have stores outside of the UK?
Questions.Answer:
Outside of the UK we have stores in Ireland, The Netherlands and Belgium as well as franchise stores throughout Asia, the Middle East and Europe.

To find your nearest store please use our Store Locator.

Questions.Question: How secure is your site?
Questions.Answer:
Shopping online should always be as secure as shopping in store. Your privacy is important.

That's why we keep any personal information you provide on a secure server to protect it. We also operate a secure SSL 128-Bit Encrypted payment system, so you can be sure your orders are being processed safely.

When in checkout, there will be a padlock symbol on your screen. If you click on it you'll see our VeriSign secure certificate, confirming your data is safe.

Please be assured that we only share your information if you have given us permission to do so. We do reserve the right to disclose information in certain circumstances clearly stated in our Privacy Policy, to be found in our ‘Terms and Conditions’.

River Island operates a fraud prevention policy and undertakes searches for the purpose of verifying your identity & details. Agencies we use may check details you supply against any particulars on any database (public or otherwise) to which they have access. They may also use your details in the future to assist other companies for verification purposes. By submitting your order you agree to this.

Enquires should be directed in the first instance to:

The Data Protection Compliance Officer
River Island
Chelsea House
Westgate
London
W5 1DR
United Kingdom

Questions.Question: At what stage is payment taken from my card?
Questions.Answer:
We gain bank authorisation for your debit/credit card once you place an order with us. However, your card will not be charged, until we despatch your goods to you.

Upon despatch you will receive an email from us to confirm which items are being sent and the exact amount being charged to your card. This means that if for any reason we are unable to send any of the items you ordered you will only be charged for the items we do send.

Questions.Question: Why hasn't my card payment gone through?
Questions.Answer:
We're not always able to specify why card payments don't clear, as the card payment process involves both our systems and your banks.

If a card payment fails please double check you've entered all the details correctly, that you are using a card which has not expired, and that your billing address has been entered at checkout exactly as it appears on your bank statement.

Please make sure that your billing address on your account details is the same as the details that your payment card is registered to, otherwise your payment will be declined. This is for your protection.

If all else fails then please try an alternative card for payment - we accept all major credit and debit cards.

Questions.Question: Why has my payment been declined?
Questions.Answer:
Don't worry - This can happen for a number of reasons...

Try checking the details you've saved in your account to ensure that the card details such as the start date and card type are correct and your billing address is the same one the card is registered to.

If the problem persists, enter the details of another card and try that.

Questions.Question: The item I want is not available, can I check if it's in a store?
Questions.Answer:
Please contact our Customer Service team and they'll try and find it in one of your local stores.

Before contacting them, please make note of the six digit product number, as this willll help them find it quicker.

Contact Customer Services by phone Monday to Friday 8am - 7pm and Saturday to Sunday 8am - 6pm (0)844 576 6444

Please note this service is only available within the UK and Ireland.

Unfortunately we are unable to carry out searches for sale items.

Questions.Question: I've seen an item in the Sale that isn't available in my size. Can I check availability in stores?
Questions.Answer: I'm sorry but due to the very fast movement of stock during sale time, we're unable to carry out product searches for any sale items.

Questions.Question: If an item is available in my local store, am I able to reserve it?
Questions.Answer: Our stores will be happy to hold any non sale item for you until the end of their trading day. Please use our Store Locator to find the telephone number for your local store.

Questions.Question: The item I want isn't in my local store, can it be sent from another?
Questions.Answer: Unfortunately this is not a service we provide.

Questions.Question: How do I remove my email address from your mailing list?
Questions.Answer: You can remove yourself from our mailing list by clicking on the unsubscribe link at the bottom of the email you receive from us.

Questions.Question: Where do I enter my promotion code ?
Questions.Answer: If you are placing an order using the River Island's iPad/iPhone app, you will find the promotion code box when you get to the shopping bag.

Questions.Question: Can I enter more than one promotional code ?
Questions.Answer:
Not at this time. You can only use one promotional code at a time.

If you enter more than one promotion code, only the last code you enter will be applied to your order.

Questions.Question: I'm using the app and I can't enter my promotion code...
Questions.Answer: The iPad and iPhone apps have been updated to enable you to enter a promotion code when using them. Please check the app store to ensure you have the latest version of the app installed on your device.

Questions.Question: Why doesn't my promotion code work ?
Questions.Answer:
Your promotion code may have expired. Please check the validity dates and times of the promotion code you are trying to enter.

Your discount will only be visible once you have proceeded to the checkout page. Continue to checkout and you will see your discount has been applied within your summary bag.

You may have entered the incorrect promotion code. Please check that you have entered the correct code for the country to which you are having your order delivered.

You may not have spent the minimum required to activate the promotion. Please check the promotion terms and conditions to see if your order qualifies. Sometimes there may be a different minimum spend for different countries.

Questions.Question: When will the discount be applied to my order ?
Questions.Answer:
The discount will be applied when you enter the promotion code in the shopping bag, but will only show on your order once you proceed to the checkout.

In the case of promotion codes for free or discounted delivery, the discount will only show on your order once you have chosen your delivery option.

Questions.Question: How many times can I use the same promotion code ?
Questions.Answer:
This will differ depending on the specific promotions.

Whilst some promotion codes may be single-use only, others may be used as often as you like. The restrictions will be clearly displayed in the terms & conditions of each promotion code.

Questions.Question: Can the promotion code be used with other offers?
Questions.Answer:
At this time, you can only use one promotion code per order.

Our site will update your order with only the last promotion code you entered. If you enter more than one promotion code, only the last code you enter will be applied to your order.

In some cases, certain product ranges may be excluded from a particular promotion. The restrictions will be clearly displayed in the terms & conditions of each promotion code.

Questions.Question: What format must I enter the promotion code ?
Questions.Answer: You must enter the promotion code without any spaces between any of the letters or numbers. It doesn’t matter if you enter the promotion code in upper or lower case.

Questions.Question: I forgot to add my promotion code before confirming my order..
Questions.Answer:
Can the discount still be applied ?

Unfortunately, it is not possible to apply the discount after you have placed your order. Please check that the discount has been applied before you click “Confirm order”.

Questions.Question: Returning via postal services
Questions.Answer:
Want to return an item via postal services? Here's how...

Returning via the Post Office™ in the UK

Returns via the Post Office™ in the UK are free!

Complete and detach the Returns Slip (found at the bottom of your Despatch Note) included in your parcel, making sure to enter the most appropriate reason for the return, and fill in all the relevant details.
Securely repack the items for return in their original packaging, together with the completed Returns Slip.
Peel off the Returns Label from your Despatch Note and fix it to the front of your parcel, covering the original label with your name and address on it.
Take the parcel to your Post Office™ within 14 days of receipt and remember to obtain a Certificate of Posting.
It is important to keep your Despatch Note and Certificate of Posting in a safe place as it will bear a very important, unique reference number. If for any reason we do not receive your parcel or you have a query about your refund, you should quote this number in all communication with us - without this information we cannot refund you.
It can take up to 28 days for a return to be processed once we have received your parcel should you choose to send it back to us via the Post Office™ or Parcel Collection Service.
Please do not send any payments with your returns.

For reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

Returning via International Postal Services

Please note that all International Returns must be sent via the local postal service. River Island does not cover the cost of International Returns.
To return an item via international postal services please complete and detach the Returns Slip (found at the bottom of your Despatch Note) included in your parcel, making sure to enter the most appropriate reason for the return, and fill in all the relevant details.
Securely repack the items for return in their original packaging, together with the completed Returns Slip.
Peel off the Returns Label from your Despatch Note and fix it to the front of your parcel, covering the original label with your name and address on it. Arrange delivery with the local postal service within 14 days of receipt and remember to obtain a Certificate of Posting.
It is important to keep your Despatch Note and Certificate of Posting in a safe place as it will bear a very important, unique reference number. If for any reason we do not receive your parcel or you have a query about your refund, you should quote this number in all communication with us - without this information we cannot refund you.
It can take up to 28 days for a return to be processed once we have received your parcel should you choose to send it back to us via the local postal service.
Please do not send any payments with your returns.
For reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

Questions.Question: Returning via courier (UK ONLY)
Questions.Answer:
Returning via Courier (UK only) using the River Island Parcel Collection Service is free and easy to use

Simply call the number printed on the back of your Despatch Note (included in your parcel) to arrange a pickup.
Complete and detach the Returns Slip (found at the bottom of your Despatch Note) included in your parcel, making sure to enter the most appropriate reason for the return, and fill in all the relevant details.
Securely repack the items for return in their original packaging, together with the completed Returns Slip.
Peel off the Returns Label from your Despatch Note and fix it to the front of your parcel, covering the original label with your name and address on it.
Please note that the Parcel Collection Service is free but we are unable to pre-arrange specific time slots. The service is most suited to our home based customers as you will need to be available on your specified collection day.
Always make sure that you obtain a receipt when the courier collects.
It can take up to 28 days for a return to be processed once we have received your parcel should you choose to send it back to us via the Post Office™ or Parcel Collection Service.
PFor reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

Questions.Question: Returning via Collect+ (UK only)
Questions.Answer:
Returning via Collect+ (UK only) is free and easy to use.

If you are a UK customer, you can return your order for free via any local supermarket, newsagent or corner shop that offers the Collect+ service. To find your nearest Collect+ store, please click here (will open in your mobile device's browser).

To make a return using this service, simply complete and detach the Returns Slip (found at the bottom of your Despatch Note) included in your parcel, making sure to enter the most appropriate reason for the return, and fill in all the relevant details.

Securely repack the items for return in their original packaging, together with the completed Returns Slip.

To produce your unique returns label, click on the Collect+ box/link found in your order despatch email. Print the label and fix it to the front of your parcel, making sure to cover the original sticker with your name and address on it.

Take the parcel to your chosen Collect+ store within 14 days of receipt and remember to obtain a proof of postage.

It can take up to 28 days for a return to be processed once we have received your parcel should you choose to send it back to us via the Collect+ Service.

For reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

If you no longer have a record of your despatch email, please visit www.collectplus.co.uk/river-island to generate a new Collect+ label will open in your mobile device's browser).

Questions.Question: How long have I got to send an item back and get a refund?
Questions.Answer:
We hope you love every River Island purchase you make...

If you ever need to return an item you can do so within one month of receipt.

Visit our Returning Goods page to see all of the available returns options for you.

For customers outside the UK, please see our International Returns page for returns options.

Questions.Question: Can I return my online purchases to a store for an exchange or refund?
Questions.Answer:
Yes you can and this is the quickest way of getting your items refunded or exchanged...

You can find your nearest River Island store by using our Store Locator.

You will need to take your despatch note (that you receive with your order) with you.

Without a proof of purchase, you will not be able to receive a refund. You will only be able to receive a credit note to spend in store or an exchange to the current selling price of your items.

Questions.Question: Is there anything that I can't send back for a refund?
Questions.Answer:
For reasons of health and hygiene, we cannot offer refunds on food, grooming products, pierced jewellery and underwear. In addition, swimwear cannot be returned if the hygiene strip has been removed.

Gifts, cosmetics and electrical goods must be returned in a good condition with their original packaging.

This does not affect your statutory rights.

Questions.Question: I have received a faulty item?
Questions.Answer:
We want all our customers to receive top quality goods so if you think there is a fault with an item you have received, you can return the item back to us to assess.

If any product fails to give reasonable wear - due to either defective workmanship or materials, we will refund you the purchase price. This guarantee is in addition to and does not affect your statutory rights.

For details on how to return your faulty items, please see our Returns page.

For customer outside of the UK, we will also refund you an amount to cover your return postage. The amount we refund will be based on the country you are sending the items from and how much the items weigh. These amounts vary from country to country and will be refunded to the card you originally used to pay for your order. This guarantee is in addition to and does not affect your statutory rights.

For details on how to return your faulty items, please see our International Returns page.

Questions.Question: Will my return postage be refunded?
Questions.Answer:
For returns within the UK sending items back is free if you use the Freepost via any UK Post Office™ or arrange Via courier using the River Island Parcel Collection Service.

Please note that River Island does not cover the cost of international returns unless the items being returned are faulty. For faulty items returned from outside the UK, once we receive your returned parcel, we will refund you an amount based on the country you are sending the items from and how much the items weigh.

These amounts vary from country to country and will be refunded to the card you originally used to pay for your order.

For customers in Germany, please Contact Us with your order number and we will advise you how you can claim back your return postage.

Questions.Question: I've sent some items back to you, how will I be refunded?
Questions.Answer:
Once we have received and processed your returned items, your online refund will be made only to the card used for the purchase.

Please allow up to 28 days for the amount to appear on your payment card, if after this time you have not received your refund, please Contact Us and we will investigate.

Questions.Question: How long after I've sent my parcel back to you will I be refunded?
Questions.Answer:
Returns made via the Post Office™ or Parcel Collection service can take up to 28 days to process. You must include a completed Returns Slip in your parcel, stating the reason for the return.

Please allow up to 28 days for the amount refunded to appear on your payment card, if after this time you have not received your refund, please Contact Us and we will investigate why.

As soon as your return has been processed by our warehouse, we'll email you to let you know.

Questions.Question: What if my parcel gets lost on the way back to you?
Questions.Answer: Whenever you send a parcel back to us via the UK Post Office™ or if from outside the UK you use your own Postal Service, please make sure that you obtain a Proof of Postage. We will need this to investigate your parcel if it gets lost on its return to us.

Questions.Question: I've lost my despatch note, what can I do?
Questions.Answer:
Don't worry....

If you've lost your despatch note just send a covering letter in your parcel clearly stating the following:-

  • Your Name and Address
  • Your Order number
  • The reason for returning your order

Questions.Question: How will I know when my order has been refunded to me?
Questions.Answer: As soon as your return has been processed by our warehouse, we'll email you to let you know.

Questions.Question: How can I find out where my nearest store is ?
Questions.Answer:
Our store locator will be able to tell you your nearest store and address details along with the telephone number, it will also give you some alternative stores in and around your location and tell you how far they are away from you.

To find your nearest store please use our Store Locator.

Questions.Question: Do you have stores outside of the UK?
Questions.Answer:
Outside of the UK we have stores in Ireland, The Netherlands and Belgium as well as franchise stores throughout Asia, the Middle East and Europe.

To find your nearest store please use our Store Locator.

Questions.Question: How do I find out a store's opening hours?
Questions.Answer:
Each of our stores have different opening hours. To find out the opening hours of your local store, it's best to contact the store directly to confim times. Each store has a customer care line that will give the specific opening times for the store you call.

You can find each store's telephone number by using our Store Locator.

Questions.Question: Can I check availability of any stock in my local stores online?
Questions.Answer:
Unfortunately our site doesn't offer this service.

Don't worry though, you can contact our Customer Service team and they'll try and find it in one of your local stores.

Before contacting them, please make note of the six digit product number, as this will help them find it quicker.

Contact Customer Services by phone Monday to Friday 8am - 7pm and Saturday to Sunday 8am - 6pm on (0)844 576 6444

Please note this service is only available within the UK and Ireland.

Unfortunately we are unable to carry out searches for sale items.

Questions.Question: If an item is available in my local store, am I able to reserve it?
Questions.Answer:
Our stores will be more than happy to hold any non sale item for you until the end of their trading day.
Please use our Store Locator to find the telephone number for your local store.

Questions.Question: The item I want isn't in my local store, can it be sent from another?
Questions.Answer: Unfortunately this is not a service we provide.

Questions.Question: How can I make a complaint about a store?
Questions.Answer: If you have any feedback regarding any of our stores or the service you've received, please Contact Us and let us know.

Questions.Question: Standard delivery
Questions.Answer:
Standard delivery

£3.99

3-4 days*

*Deliveries are usually within 3-4 working days of placing your order, although at busy times this may be longer. We will confirm the expected delivery date at the checkout before you place your order and this information will be included in your order confirmation email.

You can enter delivery instructions when you're placing your order e.g. "leave with neighbour". However River Island are not liable for any parcels that are lost or stolen if specific delivery instructions are left for the carrier.

Delivery will take place between 8am and 9pm and in some cases a signature may be required. If nobody is available when your parcel is delivered and there isn't a safe place to leave the parcel, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

We are unable to deliver on Bank Holidays so please allow an extra working day for this.

Deliveries to the following locations may take up to two working days longer:

  • The Scottish Highlands & Islands
  • The Isle of Wight
  • The Isle of Man
  • Northern Ireland

Questions.Question: Next day delivery
Questions.Answer:
Next Day Delivery

£5.99

Next day*

*Orders placed before 9pm Monday to Friday will be delivered the next day, orders placed after 9pm on Friday and before 5pm on Saturday will be delivered on Sunday. Orders placed after 5pm on Saturday and before 5pm Sunday will be delivered on Monday. Orders placed before 5pm on UK Bank Holidays will be delivered the next day (provided the next day isn't also a Bank Holiday). Orders placed after 9pm on a Bank Holiday will be delivered two days later. We will confirm the expected delivery date at checkout when you place your order.

You can enter delivery instructions when you're placing your order e.g. "leave with neighbour". However River Island are not liable for any parcels that are lost or stolen if specific delivery instructions are left for the carrier

Delivery will take place between 8am and 9pm and in some cases a signature may be required. If nobody is available when your parcel is delivered and there isn't a safe place to leave the parcel, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

Unfortunately Next Day deliveries are not currently available to the following areas:

  • The Scottish Highlands & Islands
  • The Isle of Wight
  • The Isle of Man
  • Northern Ireland

Place your order before 16:00 GMT/BST to ensure the fastest Express Delivery time for your delivery destination. You can use a Time Zone converter to convert the GMT/BST time to your local time.

Questions.Question: Nominated day delivery
Questions.Answer:
Nominated Day Delivery

£5.99

Nominated day

Select a delivery day of your choice, up to seven days in advance. Deliveries are made between 8am and 9pm on your chosen day.

You can enter delivery instructions when you're placing your order e.g. "leave with neighbour". However River Island are not liable for any parcels that are lost or stolen if specific delivery instructions are left for the carrier.

Delivery will take place between 8am and 9pm and in some cases a signature may be required. If nobody is available when your parcel is delivered and there isn't a safe place to leave the parcel, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

We are unable to deliver on Bank Holidays so please allow an extra working day for this.

Unfortunately Nominated Day deliveries are not currently available to the following areas:

  • The Scottish Highlands & Islands
  • The Isle of Wight
  • The Isle of Man
  • Northern Ireland

Questions.Question: Precise delivery
Questions.Answer:
Precise Delivery

£5.99

Precise

Precise Delivery allows you to select an hour slot for delivery at checkout, which you can schedule up to seven days in advance. Delivery slots are available between 8am and 8pm on your chosen day.

You can enter delivery instructions when you're placing your order e.g. "leave with neighbour". However River Island are not liable for any parcels that are lost or stolen if specific delivery instructions are left for the carrier.

Delivery will take place between 8am and 9pm and in some cases a signature may be required. If nobody is available when your parcel is delivered and there isn't a safe place to leave the parcel, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

We are unable to deliver on Bank Holidays so please allow an extra working day for this.

Unfortunately Nominated Day deliveries are not currently available to the following areas:

  • The Scottish Highlands & Islands
  • The Isle of Wight
  • The Isle of Man
  • Northern Ireland

Questions.Question: International delivery service (outside the UK)
Questions.Answer:
International Delivery times and charges vary dependant on your country. To view a full list of the countries we deliver to along with associated delivery times and costs, please see our International Delivery page.

Additional taxes, fees or levies may apply according to local legislation. Recipients of deliveries made outside the UK may have to pay import duty or formal customs entry fees. Any customs or import duties are charged once the parcel reaches its destination country. These charges must be paid by the recipient of the parcel. We have no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. Customs policies vary widely from country to country so you may want to contact your local customs office for further information.

If you aren't available when your parcel is delivered, the delivery driver will leave a calling card with instructions on how to rearrange delivery.

Questions.Question: How can I track my order?
Questions.Answer:
Deliveries to the UK

When your order is despatched from our warehouse, we'll send you an email with your tracking number and a link to our carrier’s website to tell you the current status of your delivery.

Deliveries outside the UK

When your order is despatched from our warehouse, we'll send you an email. If we have sent your order via courier, this email will contain a tracking number and a link to our courier’s website to tell you the current status of your delivery.

Please note that some deliveries outside of the UK will be sent via an international postal service where parcel tracking is unavailable. If your parcel has been sent via an international postal service, we'll let you know this in the despatch confirmation email we send you.

Questions.Question: What should I do if my order isn't delivered?
Questions.Answer:
If your order has not been delivered within the timescales for your country, please Contact Us . Please remember to include your order number within your message as this will help us speed up the search for your order.

If we're unable to locate your parcel, we will send you a ‘Missing Parcel Claim Form’ to sign and return, which will act as a declaration of your claim. Upon receipt of your declaration, we will investigate the claim and advise you of the outcome within 4 working days. If appropriate, a refund will be issued to the credit/debit card used for your purchase.

Questions.Question: I've received a faulty or incorrect item in my order
Questions.Answer:
If you think there is a fault with an item you have received, please return it to us to assess.

If any product fails to give reasonable wear - due to either defective workmanship or materials, we will refund you the purchase price. This guarantee is in addition to and does not affect your statutory rights.

For details on how to return your faulty items, please see our Returns section.

For customers outside of the UK, we will also refund you an amount to cover your return postage. These amounts vary from country to country and will be refunded to the card you originally used to pay for your order. This guarantee is in addition to and does not affect your statutory rights.

For details on how to return your faulty items, please see our International Returns section.

If you have received an incorrect item in your order, please Contact Us with details of the error. Please remember to include your order number within your message and we'll be able to investigate further and resolve the problem.

Questions.Question: An item is missing from my order
Questions.Answer:
If an item is missing from your order, please Contact Us and let us know exactly what is wrong with your order. Please remember to include your order number within your message as this will help us speed up the search for your parcel..

If we are unable to locate your missing items, we will send you a ‘Missing Item Claim Form’ to sign and return, which will act as a declaration of your claim. Upon receipt of your declaration, we will investigate the claim and advise you of the outcome within 4 working days. If appropriate, a refund will be issued to the credit/debit card used for your purchase.
